Text: Bedale:  Historically part of the North Riding of Yorkshire, it is situated 34 mi north of Leeds, 26 mi south-west of Middlesbrough and 7 mi south-west of the county town of Northallerton.
Triplets:<Bedale
3:
--------------------
Text: Bedale:  Bedale Beck is a tributary of the River Swale, which forms one of the Yorkshire Dales, with its predominance of agriculture and its related small traditional trades, although tourism is increasingly important.
Triplets:<Bedale
